1.17.40.title: Minecraft - 1.17.40 (Bedrock)
1.17.40.md:
__**Minecraft - 1.17.40 (Bedrock)**__
> The 1.17.40 update has arrived! This release brings new bug fixes to the game, as well as some new experimental features.

**Fixes:**
1. Added new world/cave generation when upgrading saved chunks below "Y=0" using the Caves & Cliffs experimental toggle Chunks previously upgraded with Bedrock underneath will not see this change For more information, please see our FAQ ! We'd love to hear your feedback about it at aka.ms/CavesCliffsFeedback
2. Chunks previously upgraded with Bedrock underneath will not see this change
3. For more information, please see our FAQ ! We'd love to hear your feedback about it at aka.ms/CavesCliffsFeedback
4. Added a new mountain biome: Stony Peaks! This is a variant of lofty/snow-capped peaks that uses stone and gravel instead of snow and ice, and is used to avoid temperature clashes such as a snow-capped peak sticking up from a jungle
5. This is a variant of lofty/snow-capped peaks that uses stone and gravel instead of snow and ice, and is used to avoid temperature clashes such as a snow-capped peak sticking up from a jungle
6. Corrected vegetation in Mountain Meadows
7. Dripstone Clusters can now only be found in the Dripstone biome
8. Dripstone features now only generate in Dripstone biome
9. Mountain biomes now have correct feature places to match the Java Edition side-snapshot
10. Infested Stone can be found under new mountains
11. Tweaked ore distribution to match the Java Edition side-snapshot
12. Clouds are now at Y level 192
13. Tweaked biome placement, river size, and terrain shapes for a better overworld experience
14. Tweaked mob spawning in mountain and cave biomes to match the Java Edition side-snapshot
15. Trees in swamps can now generate slightly deeper when in water
16. Deepslate now generates at lower depths ( MCPE-125117 )
17. Dripstone features now generate at Deepslate depths
18. The placement logic of Small Dripstone feature has been refactored so frequency is similar but exact positions will differ
19. Copper Ore now generates up to y=96 instead of y=64 ( MCPE-125233 )
20. Flat worlds with the Caves & Cliffs experimental toggle enabled will properly upgrade to use the new dimension heights
21. Upgrades older flat worlds to the new extended heights available with the Caves & Cliffs experimental toggle
22. New flat worlds using the Caves & Cliffs experimental toggle will generate starting at "y=-64"
23. Maps now correctly show the colors of blocks below a Y level of zero ( MCPE-136638 )
24. Vines now generate in Lush Caves instead of generating above the surface ( MCPE-125800 )
25. Vines can now grow down below zero height
26. Villages now generate in the style of the biome they are located in ( MCPE-136939 )
27. New achievements screens are now available on Windows 10 ARM-based PCs
28. Fixed a crash that could occur when using Character Creator
29. Fixed a softlock that could occur when on the Realms world slots screen and the internet connection was lost
30. Fixed an issue causing Marketplace downloads on Nintendo Switch to fail after entering and leaving a world
31. World settings are now carried over on to Realms when replacing worlds
32. Fixed a most unfortunate issue that caused players to be set on fire upon changing dimensions if there was Lava underneath the Nether Portal ( MCPE-28765 )
33. Improved world visibility culling for underground situations to eliminate seeing sky at the end of tunnels/stairs ( MCPE-128372 )
34. Players can no longer eat food at full hunger in Survival mode ( MCPE-60807 )
35. Amethyst geodes are now much less likely to generate in Strongholds, and if they do they will not destroy End Portals ( MCPE-129861 , MCPE-128799 )
36. Dungeons are no longer misplaced or missing outside of the Caves & Cliffs experimental toggle ( MCPE-121708 )
37. Vanilla Parity: Players are now able to activate Elytra gliding while moving upward ( MCPE-59580 )
38. Tropical Fish no longer lose their colors upon grabbing them with a Water Bucket and then releasing them ( MCPE-137158 )
39. Bees now spawn properly in the world ( MCPE-132195 )
40. Mobs no longer casually stroll into open flames ( MCPE-23835 )
41. Villagers can no longer spam doors open and closed ( MCPE-28055 )
42. Cartographers now more consistently give new maps on all platforms
43. Improved mob pathing around partial blocks ( MCPE-127381 )
44. Armor no longer renders on Pillagers and Vindicators, but the mobs are still granted armor effects ( MCPE-74242 )
45. Fixed an issue with mob rendering that caused Vindicator Axes to be visible even when they're not attacking on older Resource Packs ( MCPE-123229 )
46. More mobs will now spawn underground in the Overworld
47. Fixed failure to render Leads when attached to mobs out of view ( MCPE-63931 )
48. Iron Golems now spawn only on solid blocks ( MCPE-140145 )
49. Falling Stalactites are now offset properly to avoid interacting with entities outside their intended hitbox ( MCPE-132772 )
50. Beehives now generate in the world facing South
51. Trapdoors now rotate correctly when loaded from a Structure Block( MCPE-66933 )
52. Powder Snow no longer disappears when looking at it from a distance ( MCPE-127565 )
53. Sea Grass no longer spawns under Lily Pads during world generation to avoid breaking them
54. Holding Top Snow in hand while hovering over Grass Blocks no longer causes incorrect behavior ( MCPE-140659 , MCPE-140660 )
55. Riding an animal now displays the correct button prompt when playing with non-touch controls
56. Using Dye on Signs that contain formatted color text will now overwrite the formatted color text
57. Fixed text on Signs losing their formatting when new lines or word-wrapping are encountered. Formatting will now persist until the reset code or an overriding code is found. This is not retroactive and previously created Signs will not be changed
58. Altered the message that is displayed when players change skins in-game ( MCPE-92772 )
59. Fixed an issue where the D-pad and directional keys could not be used to navigate in certain parts of the user interface ( MCPE-132826 )
60. Fixed an issue where an error message could be shown after suspending the game on the Achievements screens with Screen Animations disabled ( MCPE-132269 )
61. Fixed an issue where an obscure game rule was added to Settings ( MCPE-139025 )
62. The sign in text on the main menu no longer overlaps the Marketplace button
63. Added space between tab title and the word 'Tab' for text-to-speech on Settings screen
64. Added a "More Info" button to the sign in error screen
65. All changes to settings made on new worlds before creation are now transferred to the world after creation
66. Enabled ‘server authoritative block breaking’ on Realms This change should address the issue with blocks sometimes reappearing after they have been broken ( MCPE-48914 )
67. This change should address the issue with blocks sometimes reappearing after they have been broken ( MCPE-48914 )
68. In Character Creator, tweaked color tint for the default Steve skin to match default Steve ( MCPE-120818 )
69. Back appearance pieces will no longer cover the left and right arrows in the profile screen
70. Sidebar no longer opens upon expanding any of the classic skin packs in the Dressing Room
71. Improved the navigation flow for Character Creator so that it always switches to the selected Character Creator profile ( MCPE-139022 )
72. Skins that are equipped from Marketplace while in-game now apply to the player’s character
73. Education Edition items are no longer shown as an option when using @e[type=] ( MCPE-78363 )
74. Command Blocks with 'Needs Redstone' and a non-zero 'Delay in Ticks' will now execute only if they remain powered for the delay duration ( MCPE-74281 )
75. Fixed alignment of the sidebar display from the '/scoreboard' command when text length changes
76. Fixed the ability to summon experience orbs via the '/summon' command ( MCPE-130835 )
77. Updated Add-On templates for 1.17.40 are available for download with new resources, behaviors, and documentation Resource Pack Template: aka.ms/ResourcePackTemplate Behavior Pack Template (Includes documentation): aka.ms/BehaviorPackTemplate
78. Resource Pack Template: aka.ms/ResourcePackTemplate
79. Behavior Pack Template (Includes documentation): aka.ms/BehaviorPackTemplate
80. Fixed display only entity destruction in chunk discard scenarios
81. Fixed a bug that caused animations to be restarted when changing render controllers
82. Updated documentation for the Block Rotation component
83. Updated documentation for 'BlockExplosionResistance'
84. Added required toggles to documentation and to content error for block components
85. Added a content error for using a material but not providing the required number of textures to the render controller
86. Fixed 'item_remaining_use_duration'having improperly scaled or inverted results (This fix is a Versioned Change as of engine version 1.17.30)
87. Add new compile errors for expressions like 'text' + 3, which were previously ignored (This is a Versioned Change as of engine version 1.17.40)
88. Molang expressions that contain capital letters are properly evaluated now
89. 'query.get_equipped_item_name' will now recognize Sea Lanterns ( MCPE-67893 )
90. Added new compile errors for expressions like 1 + (9 10), which were previously ignored (This is a Versioned Change as of engine version 1.17.40)
91. Renamed method 'succeedWhenBlockTypePresent' to 'succeedWhenBlockPresent'
92. Fixed a bug where property id would return "Unknown" for custom entities ( MCPE-137786 )
93. Identifier strings returned from property id now include the item's namespace
94. Updated the GameTest Framework interface and added a new SimulatedPlayer capability: Added 'SimulatedPlayer'class to GameTest. This class enables GameTest to simulate a variety of player behaviors such as movement, using items, and interacting with blocks and entities. See the GameTest API reference documentation for more details Added function spawnSimulatedPlayer(blockLocation: BlockLocation, name: string): SimulatedPlayer Added function removeSimulatedPlayer(simulatedPlayer: SimulatedPlayer): void mojang-gametest.Test type Changed signature of function assertEntityInstancePresent(entity: Entity, blockLocation: BlockLocation, isPresent: boolean = true) mojang-minecraft components Component 'inventory'now works with Player inventories
95. Added 'SimulatedPlayer'class to GameTest. This class enables GameTest to simulate a variety of player behaviors such as movement, using items, and interacting with blocks and entities. See the GameTest API reference documentation for more details Added function spawnSimulatedPlayer(blockLocation: BlockLocation, name: string): SimulatedPlayer Added function removeSimulatedPlayer(simulatedPlayer: SimulatedPlayer): void
96. Added function spawnSimulatedPlayer(blockLocation: BlockLocation, name: string): SimulatedPlayer
97. Added function removeSimulatedPlayer(simulatedPlayer: SimulatedPlayer): void
98. mojang-gametest.Test type Changed signature of function assertEntityInstancePresent(entity: Entity, blockLocation: BlockLocation, isPresent: boolean = true)
99. Changed signature of function assertEntityInstancePresent(entity: Entity, blockLocation: BlockLocation, isPresent: boolean = true)
100. mojang-minecraft components Component 'inventory'now works with Player inventories
101. Component 'inventory'now works with Player inventories
102. Removed method 'thenWaitWithDelay'
103. Added method 'thenWaitAfter(delayTicks: number, callback: () => undefined)'- After a delay, executes the given callback every tick until it succeeds. Exceptions thrown within the callback will end sequence execution
104. Fixed a bug where the location property would return an incorrect height for players
105. Added property 'id'
106. Replaced method 'getLocation' with property 'location'
107. Replaced method getPermutation with property 'permutation'
108. Replaced method 'getType' with property 'type'
109. Replaced methods 'isWaterlogged' and 'setWaterlogged' with property 'isWaterlogged'
110. Replaced method 'getBlockData' with property 'permutation'
111. Replaced method 'isEmpty' with property 'isEmpty'
112. Removed property 'canBeWaterlogged'
113. Replaced method 'getName' with property 'id'
114. Replaced method 'canBeWaterlogged' with property 'canBeWaterlogged'
115. Replaced method 'getType' with property 'type'

**Update:** https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/4411311573133-Minecraft-1-17-40-Bedrock

__**Minecraft - 1.17.32 (Bedrock)**__
> A new Minecraft hotfix is now available with several fixes to improve your gameplay experience.

**Fixes:**
1. Fixed several crashes that could occur during gameplay
2. Fixed a crash that could occur when navigating the Marketplace sidebar
3. Fixed issues with content not loading, even when connected to the internet ( MCPE-102994 )
4. Fixed an issue where light blocks would force players to spawn at the surface of the Overworld
5. Fixed the Looting enchantment not being applied when a mob was killed with a projectile ( MCPE-141935 )
6. Fixed issue causing "Couldn't pack your world file for upload" error when uploading a world to Realms on Nintendo Switch
7. Fixed some chunks being deleted when reentering a flat world and old world with the Caves & Cliffs experimental toggle enabled, as well as other world generation issues ( MCPE-140428 )

**Update:** https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/4410304508429-Minecraft-1-17-32-Bedrock

1.17.30.title: Minecraft - 1.17.30 (Bedrock)
1.17.30.md:
__**Minecraft - 1.17.30 (Bedrock)**__
> It's time for the Minecraft 1.17.30 update! The team has been working hard on bug fixes and changes to the Caves & Cliffs: Part I experience. Those who are feeling adventurous can even check out experimental world generation to discover the highest peaks and deepest caves. Read all about it below!

**Fixes:**
1. Added the "Respawn Blocks Explode" game rule, which can be used to prevent Respawn Anchors and Beds from exploding ( MCPE-76687 )
2. Corner Mode is used with the Detect button in Save Mode to define the area to save. It will only detect Corner Blocks with the same name as the structure being saved
3. Monsters now only spawn in complete darkness
4. This change is being made to balance the player's ability to light up the new larger caves and make them safe from monster spawning
5. Note that this change only affects block-light and not sky light
6. Please send us your feedback on this change at aka.ms/CavesCliffsFeedback !
7. New and improved terrain and biome generation algorithm that creates more natural terrain and biome transitions
8. Improved surface decoration that detects the difference between when blocks are generated underwater and underground
9. Introduces large ore veins to world generation adding more strategy to mining
10. Introduces noodle caves to world generation, creating small pathways between bigger caves
11. Introduces the possibility of dry cave entrances that make it easier to access the new noise caves
12. Introduces a new algorithm that finds suitable spawn positions closer to origin
13. Added logic to save and load SubChunks by absolute Y index to support data-driven dimension height ranges
14. Updated the Achievements button and moved from the Profile screen to the Main Menu and Pause screens
15. Optimised pasting Unicode text into Book & Quill ( MCPE-119651 )
16. Fixed a crash that could occur when crafting a Crafting Table with Gameplay Tips enabled
17. Fixed a crash that could occur after disconnecting from the internet while playing in an online session as the client on iOS
18. Fixed a crash that could sometimes occur when downloading large Marketplace worlds
19. Worlds with the Caves & Cliffs experimental toggle enabled are now more likely to have the same default world spawn position as worlds without the experiment using the same seed ( MCPE-127708 )
20. Matched respawn from Bed behavior with Java Edition by attempting to avoid placing players on damage dealing blocks when waking up and attempting to place players on the side of the bed they entered from ( MCPE-118654 )
21. Nether Portals placed between chunks no longer break when leaving the Nether ( MCPE-74333 )
22. Damaging buff effects no longer bypass absorption hearts ( MCPE-62360 )
23. Enchanting Table's enchantment probability is now weighted ( MCPE-101588 )
24. Fixed incorrect position when dismounting at a negative world height ( MCPE-136622 )
25. Abandoned villages are now far rarer, more closely matching the Java Edition ( MCPE-71769 )
26. Fixed emissive light propagation in ray tracing mode by increasing irradiance cache sample size ( MCPE-135157 )
27. Fall damage is no longer applied when falling into Scaffolding ( MCPE-108459 )
28. Cartographers will now only give maps to undiscovered monuments ( MCPE-29375 )
29. Tweaked Iron Golem spawning logic to better match Java Edition
30. Axolotls now spawn only when there is stone up to 10 blocks under them, and not inside bubble columns
31. Collecting Fish or Axolotl with a Bucket no longer immediately releases them ( MCPE-44320 )
32. Armor Stands now drop equipped items when destroyed by fire or lava ( MCPE-94603 )
33. Limited the maximum number of Phantom mobs that can spawn ( MCPE-106557 )
34. Goats now play their "impact 3" sound ( MCPE-127757 )
35. Grown up Goats no longer lose their Horns when reloading a world
36. Baby Goats no longer have horns ( MCPE-123253 )
37. Fixed an animation parity issue with Skeletons not using both arms to hold their Bows ( MCPE-670 )
38. Undead mobs standing near Powder Snow now burn normally ( MCPE-131005 )
39. Powder Snow above undead mobs now prevents burning effect
40. Multiple Shulkers are no longer able to spawn in the same position from spawn eggs or End City generation ( MCPE-43972 )
41. Mobs can now pathfind correctly when standing on Amethyst Buds ( MCPE-130010 )
42. Lightning no longer randomly strikes mobs that are under blocks ( MCPE-121688 )
43. Fixed mobs sometimes rendering with incorrect geometry when viewed from the Structure Block preview window ( MCPE-95183 )
44. Experimental Features: Wither can now be spawned at negative heights ( MCPE-125270 )
45. Ghasts no longer spawn in less than 5x4x5 areas ( MCPE-133687 )
46. Magma Cubes no longer spawn in less than 3x3x2 areas ( MCPE-46540 )
47. Medium Magma Cubes now have a larger hitbox ( MCPE-132159 )
48. The Thorns enchantment now does Knockback to mobs ( MCPE-56212 )
49. Cave Vines can now be pollinated by Bees ( MCPE-127821 )
50. Enchantment Tables now emit light level 7 ( MCPE-130868 )
51. The falling position of Pointed Dripstone is no longer slightly offset ( MCPE-119548 )
52. Disabled biome tinting for Spruce and Birch Leaves ( MCPE-128996 )
53. Bubble Columns are now placed properly when loaded with a Structure Block ( MCPE-97027 )
54. Vanilla Parity: Using Bone Meal on Moss Blocks now also replaces Tuff blocks ( MCPE-125922 )
55. Grass and water block tint colors are no longer slightly randomized with noise
56. Fixed Light Block not being displayed correctly when being held ( MCPE-123249 )
57. Weeping and Twisting Vines now grow correctly after the player breaks them ( MCPE-90932 )
58. Minecart with Chest will now copy over its chest contents when advanced pick blocked
59. Crimson Roots now have a small chance of growing on Warped Nylium blocks when using Bone Meal ( MCPE-83616 )
60. Candle now drops when Candle Cake is pushed by a Piston ( MCPE-130594 )
61. Renamed Structure Blocks will no longer have the incorrect data mode on creation ( MCPE-41625 )
62. Unicode font now correctly highlights on Signs with glowing text ( MCPE-130072 )
63. Pumpkins placed facing South, East, or West now can now be used to trade with Villagers if they were mined with Silk Touch tools ( MCPE-105540 )
64. More Candles can no longer be added to Candles placed without any support block ( MCPE-130810 )
65. Shulker Boxes now remain in Dispensers when dispensed at world height limit ( MCPE-130085 )
66. Monster Spawners no longer emit light
67. Powder Snow can now be collected with a Dispenser ( MCPE-127564 )
68. Target Blocks now conduct Redstone signals ( MCPE-75034 )
69. Fixed text from signs drawing on maps on ray tracing enabled hardware
70. Amethyst Cluster and Amethyst Bud can no longer be placed on Grass Path blocks
71. Corrected "Deepslate Lapis Lazuli Ore" name from "Deepslate Lapis Ore" ( MCPE-123605 )
72. Fixed Bed display if the foot of the Bed is in a brighter area than the head ( MCPE-123592 )
73. Fixed Large Chest display so the brightest end of the Chest is chosen to light the whole Chest
74. Dispensers now remove bubble columns when removing water ( MCPE-56462 )
75. Sea Pickles now change light depending on being in underwater or not ( MCPE-131642 )
76. Snow layers are now melted by light from torches, etc. ( MCPE-131272 )
77. Vanilla Parity: Falling gravity blocks will no longer break when landing on certain blocks  ( MCPE-20109 )
78. Half of the Enchantment Table book doesn't render dark anymore ( MCPE-106627 )
79. Blocks moved by a Piston no longer appear white while moving ( MCPE-66250 )
80. Spore Blossoms no longer have a randomly offset hitbox ( MCPE-121658 )
81. Measurements of hitbox of Spore Blossoms now match Java Edition
82. Moss Block and Moss Carpet now break when moved by Pistons and Sticky Pistons can no longer pull them ( MCPE-121751 , MCPE-122004 )
83. Water dripping from Pointed Dripstone can no longer fill Cauldrons with Potions. Sorry, we knew it was fun but too overpowered! ( MCPE-131180 )
84. Fixed an issue causing Slime and Honey Block movement slowdown to not be fully applied to players
85. Light Blocks are once again visible while holding one and properly show their brightness value ( MCPE-123249 )
86. Fixed Light Blocks not being removed when destroying them while holding a Light Block ( MCPE-123258 )
87. Fixed Light Block brightness not being adjustable when interacting with it ( MCPE-123387 )
88. Fixed Barrier Blocks being destructible while not holding a Barrier Block
89. Shulker Boxes now drop their contents when destroyed as an item ( MCPE-129470 , MCPE-87877 )
90. Bows and Tridents are now held more similarly to Java Edition ( MCPE-126717 , MCPE-44418 )
91. Eating Chorus Fruit while gliding no longer deals fall damage to the player ( MCPE-112621 )
92. Swords now break Bamboo in a single swing ( MCPE-64013 )
93. Fixed a bug that could cause the Trident, Shield, and Crossbow to render incorrectly when an additional player is connected over the internet using a Marketplace skin ( MCPE-118358 )
94. Fixed a bug which could cause the Spyglass to appear as if it's being thrown when using a custom skin ( MCPE-127498 )
95. Using a Powder Snow Bucket on a Cauldron filled with Powder Snow no longer creates a new Powder Snow block ( MCPE-131177 )
96. Clock and Compass items no longer function in the Recipe Book ( MCPE-36354 )
97. Lava Buckets can now be emptied into a Cauldron filled with Lava
98. Fixed offhand Shields clipping into players’ arms while in third-person perspective ( MCPE-122672 )
99. Holding a Shield in Marketplace maps no longer shows a content error
100. Made projectile items move more smoothly when far from players ( MCPE-101102 )
101. Strong/Long/Splash/Lingering Potions can now be placed in the Brewing Stand manually ( MCPE-86636 )
102. Soul Speed Boots can now be unequipped properly after losing durability ( MCPE-106367 )
103. Diamond Pickaxes found in Hoglin Stable chests are now enchanted ( MCPE-129750 )
104. Fixed held items not disappearing visually to other players after a player dies when the Keep Inventory game rule is enabled ( MCPE-64235 )
105. Shears now correctly cut Vines and Glow Lichen faster ( MCPE-123139 )
106. Campfires and Soul Campfires now stack in the inventory ( MCPE-67890 )
107. Amethyst walking sounds are now affected by the "Player" volume slider
108. Deepslate walking sounds are now affected by the "Player" volume slider
109. Moss Block walking sounds are now affected by the "Player" volume slider
110. Sounds of moving in/on Powder Snow are now affected by the "Player" volume slider
111. Jumping and landing on blocks have now their sounds affected by the "Player" volume slider ( MCPE-116135 )
112. Dripstone drip sounds are now affected by the "Block" volume slider
113. Block interaction "click" sounds are now affected by the "Blocks" volume slider ( MCPE-104983 )
114. Turtle Eggs no longer produce the Bone Meal sound when placed on Sand ( MCPE-127189 )
115. Swapped the toggle sounds for Levers so they are now parity with Java Edition ( MCPE-30379 )
116. Using a Water Bucket on a fully filled Cauldron now produces the correct sound ( MCPE-131177 )
117. Text to Speech chat setting once again correctly narrates chat messages ( MCPE-129901 )
118. Text to Speech now correctly reads item names in the inventory
119. Inventory grid slots are no longer double counted for Text to Speech focus controls
120. Fixed the hotbar being misaligned with XP bar by 1 pixel ( MCPE-46975 )
121. The hotbar is no longer too dark when anti-aliasing is increased ( MCPE-54213 )
122. The crosshair no longer flickers during multiplayer sessions ( MCPE-123918 )
123. Using the touch interface, holding the output slot on the Stonecutter or Loom will now rapidly craft items ( MCPE-128423 )
124. Fixed an incorrect popup when attempting to activate a pack with a missing dependency ( MCPE-130978 )
125. Fixed translation issues for some keys containing upper case letters
126. Replaced loading bars with new loading spinner in the Marketplace
127. Recipe Book crafting estimates no longer differ from the actual results
128. Cursor items no longer count towards recipe ingredient in Recipe Book
129. The selected recipe in the Recipe Book is now deselected when the player runs out of ingredients
130. Non-craftable recipes no longer displayed in Recipe Book when search mechanism is used
131. Nether blocks now appear in the crafting grid if any other ingredient is unavailable
132. Fixed a wireless network connection error message that appeared when players were connected via a wired network
133. Fixed various spelling errors in Character Creator
134. Hover of widget buttons were showing corrupted appearance before full load was complete
135. Fixed a legibility issue with some Japanese font characters
136. Riding an animal now displays the correct tooltip term when played on a non-touch screen
137. Experimental warning message is no longer displayed inconsistently when loading beta worlds
138. A debug string is no longer shown for how to open chat ( MCPE-128955 )
139. Fixed an issue where the item category text color did not match the item text color if it was changed in Resource Packs
140. Fixed an issue where patterns in the Loom would not display correctly with some texture packs
141. The emote wheel no longer appears when pressing Ctrl+B in-game ( MCPE-125246 )
142. Fixed Input Method Editor (IME) not working after suspending the game on Windows 10 ( MCPE-59722 )
143. Added a new sidebar to some Marketplace and Dressing Room related screens to help better improve the experience of navigating these areas
144. There is now an item transferring animation when deselecting a recipe
145. Sidebar text is now localized properly when a new language is loaded or the current language changes
146. Fixed a bug that could cause the Sign In button to appear behind the Marketplace button
147. Fixed the Noto Sans Smooth font on Windows and Xbox platforms with the Japanese locale to address legibility and usage of correct characters
148. Fixed "CR" characters incorrectly appearing at the end of lines for some display languages
149. Enabled new achievements screens for VR (not including PS VR)
150. Placing a Sign on Rooted Dirt now correctly opens the text editor ( MCPE-129280 )
151. The Sign In dialog is no longer shown on a split-screen game to anyone other than the primary player on PlayStation 4
152. Fixed tamed Wolves being transparent on the Structure Block screen
153. Improved responsiveness of Realms menus, particularly on Nintendo Switch
154. The "Download World" button is now visible for worlds on expired Realms
155. 2 player Realms no longer count against the 10 player realm limit
156. Realms reset button will now navigate to the loading screen while reset is happening
157. The Realms Slots screen will now open faster and have a loading dialog if it takes a long time
158. The Realms Backup page now only shows the most recent 1100 Realms backups to prevent text overlap issues ( REALMS-8425 )
159. Switching the active world slot in Realms no longer spams the "Fetching World Info" prompt
160. Renaming a Realm now takes effect immediately while playing
161. Fixed some issues with being unable to kick players via the user interface or the '/kick' command
162. The text on the Realms Plus trial button on the play screen no longer changes when hovered
163. Pressing the View Privacy Policy button now opens properly on Nintendo Switch
164. Fixed a crash that could occur if a structure was placed with a command in an unloaded area, and that structure was deleted
165. Teleporting a mob between dimensions no longer causes the mob to despawn ( MCPE-127414 )
166. Loading a structure with the '/structure' command now displays the correct output messages ( MCPE-132813 )
167. Updated Add-On templates for 1.17.30 are available for download with new resources, behaviors, and documentation Resource Pack Template: aka.ms/ResourcePackTemplate Behavior Pack Template (Includes documentation): aka.ms/BehaviorPackTemplate
168. Resource Pack Template: aka.ms/ResourcePackTemplate
169. Behavior Pack Template (Includes documentation): aka.ms/BehaviorPackTemplate
170. Data-driven blocks can now be added to the Creative menu
171. New chemistry material reductions for Education Edition can now be defined in the JSON files
172. "potion.prefix" and "potion. .postfix" potion string resources have been renamed to "potion. .name"
173. Potion name string resources have been changed so there are separate "Splash" and "Lingering" string resources
174. The old style of using "potion.prefix" and "potion.*.postfix" is still supported
175. UI bind objects can now utilize the 'ignore' field
176. Attachables that are visible in first person view will no longer render backwards
177. Fixed a bug where an entity might fail to initialize its tag component
178. Sky no longer renders through walls of a large enclosed area when using fog
179. Updated documentation formatting for item components and how they work within Resource Packs and Behavior Packs
180. Using Water Buckets to collect fish has been version locked to prevent breaking old world templates
181. Fixed controller support when editing NPC dialog ( MCPE-135175 )
182. 'behavior.knockback_roar' now has a vertical and horizontal strength value
183. Adjusted padding for HD Textures in mipmaps level 1 in texture atlas to fix texture bleeding
184. Killing a custom mob with an unknown loot table entry type will no longer cause a crash, and will now throw a content error ( MCPE-129006 )
185. Rabbit with initialEvent specified now scales properly to adult rabbit size ( MCPE-76643 )
186. Similar to the spawns_on_block_filter, the spawns_above_block_filter specifies a list of blocks and a distance. The mob can then spawn only if the nearest block within the specified distance below the desired spawnpoint is in that list (water and air not included). "minecraft:spawns_above_block_filter": { "blocks": "minecraft:stone", "distance": 10 }
187. Improved documentation for 'DamageableItemComponent'
188. Fixed the ability to add launch point positional offset for projectiles spawned with the 'spawn_entity' component
189. Fixed the ability to add angular offset to launch vector for projectiles spawned with the 'spawn_entity' component
190. Fixed offset not working for projectiles summoned through an interaction
191. Fixed projectile 'angleoffset' value only reflected if shooter is riding another entity
192. Fixed rotation of projectile launch point around a mob when projectile offset specified
193. Parsing of UI json field "ignored" now throws a content error if it is invalid
194. Fixed movement prediction interpolating with invalid data in even more scenarios ( MCPE-108568 )
195. Removed the "replace" element from 'sound_definitions.json' for being ambiguous in its usage (and was never used) ( MCPE-99304 )
196. Commands ran through animations now will run in the order defined in animation files on all platforms, including Realms
197. Animations and events defined in Behavior Packs can now run commands that require cheats without the player enabling cheats (such as setting certain rules with the '/gamerule' command)
198. Target selectors ry and rym now support wrapping around north
199. The '/particle' command position argument is now optional ( MCPE-128379 )
200. The '/particle' command will now output on success ( MCPE-80348 )
201. The '/particle' command no longer shows an error when run successfully through '/execute' ( MCPE-129001 )
202. The '/clone' command now copies signal strength for Levers and Redstone Dust
203. The '/structure' command can now specify a <to: x y z> position argument with y below 0 as long as it is equal or above the minimum height for that dimension
204. Added functionality for Intellisense options: "d" and "default" in the gamemode command selector ( MCPE-92198 )
205. Minecart with Command Block can now use the self selector (@s) in its commands to target itself ( MCPE-60126 )
206. The "/time set" command now sets the correct time and day when specifying a time above 24000 or below the current time (e.g. "/time set 0" sets the day to 0, "/time set 28000" sets the day to 1), and "/time" can now set or add to a negative world time ( MCPE-43394 )
207. The '/spawnpoint' command can now be used while the player is sleeping and outputs success when setting to the player's existing spawnpoint ( MCPE-106720 )
208. The camera shake command no longer shakes every player's screen when "@s" is used as the selector ( MCPE-120383 )
