1.4.0.title: Minecraft - 1.4.0 (Bedrock)
1.4.0.md:
__**Minecraft - 1.4.0 (Bedrock)**__
> Minecraft Education Edition 1.4.0:

**Fixes:**
1. Water has a completely new look and increased visibility while underwater
2. Dolphins
3. Tropical Fish
4. Cod, Salmon, and Pufferfish mobs
5. New ocean biomes of varying depths and temperatures
6. Shipwrecks
7. Ocean ravines and caves
8. Icebergs
9. Underwater ruins
10. Coral reefs
11. Buried Treasure and Treasure Maps
12. Swimming animation while sprinting in water
13. Heart of the Sea: Be sure to collect these for later to construct a Conduit that will be introduced in an upcoming update!
14. Trident weapon with new enchantments
15. Channeling
16. Loyalty
17. Riptide
18. Impaling
19. New water behavior
20. A water source block can be placed inside of most non-solid blocks
21. Flowing water will still not flow into non-solid blocks
22. Blocks can be placed underwater without creating pockets of air around them
23. Coral, Coral Fans, and Coral Blocks
24. Kelp, Dried Kelp, and Dried Kelp Blocks
25. Blue Ice blocks
26. Seagrass and Tall Seagrass
27. Sea Pickles can now be found on the ocean floor as a source of light
28. Stripped Wood
29. Wood variants for Buttons, Pressure Plates, and Trapdoors
30. Prismarine Stairs and Slabs
31. Fish can now be scooped into buckets
32. New Achievements
33. Atlantis? - Find an underwater ruin (20G)
34. Ahoy! - Find a shipwreck (20G)
35. Castaway - Eat nothing but dried kelp for three in-game days (20G)
36. Me Gold! - Dig up a buried treasure (30G)
37. Alternative Fuel - Power a furnace with a kelp block (20G)
38. Sail the 7 Seas - Visit all ocean biomes (40G)
39. Sleep with the Fishes - Stay underwater for one day without a potion (30G)
40. I'm a Marine Biologist - Collect a fish in a bucket (20G)
41. Added an Inventory section to the Store to manage all your acquired content
42. Added sorting and filtering to the Store
43. Minecraft: Education Edition Chemistry features can now be enabled under Cheats! For tips on getting started, check out the Chemistry Lab Journal
44. New item textures for Raw Fish, Cooked Fish, Raw Salmon, Cooked Salmon, Tropical Fish, and Pufferfish
45. Pumpkins can now be sheared into Carved Pumpkins
46. Leads can now be attached to boats
47. Tweaks to the directional movement of the Gameplay Cursor for more predictable movement
48. The breath meter now slowly regenerates after being underwater
49. Players can now swim through 1x1 gaps
50. Items now float in water
51. Baby Zombies now burn in daylight
52. Spawn points can now be set using Beds during the day
53. The default author for books are now set to "Author Unknown"
54. Buttons made from Oak or Stone are now displayed as Oak Button and Stone Button, respectively
55. Drowned mobs
56. Nautilus Shells
57. Crashes/Performance
58. Fixed several of the top crashes that occurred during gameplay
59. Fixed a crash that occurred when importing an Add-On with an invalid manifest file
60. Fixed a crash that occurred after rating content in the Marketplace
61. Fixed a crash that occurred when using the '/fill' command directly after '/clone' in the same tick
62. Reduced the delay when placing or destroying blocks
63. Improved load times in the Skin Picker and when applying Resource Packs
64. Improvements to Store load times
65. General
66. 'Delicious Fish' achievement can now be unlocked after cooking and eating Salmon
67. Activated resource packs will now stay active upon downloading any other resource pack during world creation
68. Several fixes to joining as a second player on Xbox One split-screen
69. Split-screen controls are no longer mixed up when the game is launched while using keyboard and mouse input on Xbox One
70. Disconnecting a controller while making input no longer continues that input until the controller is reconnected
71. Gameplay
72. Fishing will now give the proper chance of catching a stack of 10 Ink Sacs
73. Items can no longer be duplicated by rapidly dropping them while playing multiplayer
74. Lava with a block on top no longer prevents fire damage to entities and will fix Chicken cookers
75. Fire Resistance potions now protect Snow Golems from dying in warm biomes
76. Soul Sand and Gravel once again generate in the Nether
77. Fixed the crafting recipes of Prismarine Bricks and Dark Prismarine being swapped
78. When riding a boat and hitting a mob with the Knockback enchantment, the mob will no longer always be knocked toward the East
79. Zombies and Skeletons now burn in daylight while in boats
80. Players can once again build straight down while holding the jump and place buttons simultaneously
81. Fixed Villager trades becoming deactivated in certain cases when using touch controls
82. Curse of Binding and Vanishing books can no longer be acquired by trading with a Librarian Villager
83. Graphical
84. Cocoa Beans now display correctly when using HD Resource Packs
85. Farmland and Grass Paths no longer have water textures when seen underwater
86. Disconnected water flows no longer visually show as connected
87. Water source blocks surrounding Glass, Slime blocks, and Sea Lanterns no longer turn into flowing water blocks
88. Snow covered leaves no longer appear red when Smooth Lighting is disabled
89. Fixed the appearance of bubbles around the Guardian laser attack
90. User Interface
91. "Destroy Block (vibrate)" toggle once again appears in Touch settings
92. The Paper Doll is no longer in a running pose on the main menu
93. Firework Rockets now appear in the Recipe Book when being searched for in Survival
94. Initiating World Template screen now shows a progress bar
95. Fixed the 'Disconnected from server' prompt being too large on Gear VR
96. Fixed some toggles and buttons staying highlighted in Settings when they shouldn't
97. Chroma Hills HD Texture Pack fonts now apply correctly
98. Commands
99. '/clear' will now clear items held in hand when playing in Classic UI
100. Commands in chains of Command Blocks will now run sequentially when other chains are running nearby
101. Selectors targeting players in '/title' commands will now properly show the player's name
102. Updated templates for 1.4.0 with new assets and behaviors can be downloaded at minecraft.net/addons
103. When applying the 'spell_effects' component, entities will now receive the defined effect

**Update:** https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360004203351-Minecraft-1-4-0-Bedrock

1.2.13.title: Minecraft - 1.2.13 (Bedrock)
1.2.13.md:
__**Minecraft - 1.2.13 (Bedrock)**__
> Changes:

**Fixes:**
1. Realms now create automatic backups that can be downloaded and restored
2. Added two options to swap A/B buttons and X/Y buttons on controllers, which can be found in Controller Settings
3. Added menu screen transitions, which can be toggled in Settings
4. Many screens and actions now respond when a button is pressed instead of released so they now feel extra responsive
5. Palleted chunks! This means we can now have (almost) infinite different types of blocks (and also no more BlockIDs). It also means the game should be less likely to crash due to being out of memory
6. Falling on Hay Bales now reduces fall damage
7. Owned skin packs will now appear at the top of the Skin Picker
8. Purchased content will now auto-update, which can be toggled in Profile settings
9. Realms member lists can now be cleared from the Members screen
10. Updated look for the Marketplace and Search functionality to easily find specific content
11. Added Drowned mobs
12. Added the Trident and new enchantments
13. Channeling
14. Loyalty
15. Riptide
16. Impaling
17. Added Stripped Wood
18. Added Slabs and Stairs for Prismarine, Prismarine Brick, and Dark Prismarine
19. New swimming animation while sprinting in water
20. Crashes/Performance
21. Many optimizations to chunk rendering and game performance
22. Chunk generation is now prioritized first to the chunks closest to the player
23. Fixed a crash that occurred on Android devices due to rendering issues
24. Fixed a crash that occurred when creating multiple worlds of Relics of the Privateers
25. Fixed a crash that occurred when uploading a screenshot to a Club and losing internet connection
26. Fixed a crash that occurred when using CTRL+MMB on a signed, written book contained in an item frame
27. Fixed a crash that occurred when quickly entering and leaving the marketplace
28. Fixed a crash that occurred when the host leaves their world and another player is looking in a chest
29. Fixed a crash that occurred when a double chest is split using pistons and items are placed or taken from the half that was not moved
30. Fixed a crash that occurred when navigating menus using the D-pad and mouse simultaneously
31. Fixed a crash that occurred due to an issue with Redstone Torches
32. Fixed a crash that occurred when navigating the Store on low-end and mid-tier devices
33. Fixed a crash that occurred when leaving The End
34. General
35. The game is once again playable on Windows 10 Mobile when using an Xbox One controller
36. Viewing the presence on a player profile will now be accurate when playing split-screen
37. Custom skins with uppercase '.PNG' extensions are now recognized in Windows 10
38. The achievement screen will now show the most recent status without having to close and reopen the game
39. Fixed local co-op not properly saving player progress
40. Disabling ""Visible to LAN Players"" for one world no longer disables it for all worlds
41. Imported worlds will no longer automatically launch on iOS
42. Gameplay
43. Crops can once again be harvested continuously
44. Crops will now pop out of the ground if the light level is 7 or lower
45. Fixed Villager trade items not being replenished
46. Fixed some Villager trades not granting XP
47. Fixed spawn points not moving when obstructed by lava
48. It is now possible to sleep when a Skeleton Horse is nearby
49. Bows will now inflict the same amount of damage to players and mobs
50. Eyes of Ender and '/locate' will now point to the right location of a Stronghold
51. For Book & Quill, the ""Sign and Close"" button is no longer active if a name has not been entered
52. Double ferns now appear in Mega Taigas
53. Protection enchantment no longer makes players immune to fire damage
54. Activating sneak in one world and quitting no longer causes the player to spawn sneaking in in every other world
55. Pressing Open Chat together with Place Block on controller no longer causes Place Block action to repeat
56. Fixed fire spreading from covered lava
57. Fixed Pick Block replacing currently selected hotbar slot, even if other slots were empty
58. Exploding Creepers and Beds in the Nether can no longer ignite TNT in worlds that have 'TNT Explodes' turned off
59. The second player in split-screen can no longer die if their personal game mode is set to Creative
60. Experience can now be earned from cooking Porkchops in a Furnace
61. Players are no longer set on fire when walking on non-full blocks placed next to a lava source
62. Fixed player faces on maps so they no longer turn into arrows when they move too far from other players but will turn into arrows when close to other players
63. Fixed Creative flight speed being too slow until changing altitude after entering a world
64. Falling on a Slime Block while sneaking now inflicts fall damage
65. Items
66. Fixed items losing durability when used on other players and the PvP game rule is disabled
67. Enchanted Apples can once again be found in loot chests
68. Name Tags can once again be found from Villager trading and fishing
69. Diamonds will now appear in the loot chests of Jungle Temples and Strongholds
70. Map items in converted Xbox One Edition worlds now have the proper alignment
71. The starting maps for Old Worlds are now zoomed in to level 1/4
72. Maps will no longer show a green marker only for the last map that was placed in an item frame
73. Glass Bottles can now be filled from water sources in Creative mode
74. Pickaxes now break Stone Buttons faster than hands
75. Bows can no longer be used to mine while charging
76. Blocks
77. Extra blocks will no longer be placed when placing a block straight down
78. Glass Panes now align to Stairs
79. Increased the hitbox of Soul Sand
80. Grass blocks will now turn into Dirt if Grass Path blocks are placed above them
81. Vines can no longer be placed invisibly under leaf blocks
82. Leaves no longer cut through blocks when growing trees using Bone Meal
83. Anvils now drop as items when falling on Torches
84. Stone Slabs and Cobblestone Walls now have the proper blast resistance
85. Top Snow falling on a Top Snow Block no longer loses one layer
86. Breaking Cobblestone that is being pushed by a Piston no longer drops an invalid 'Update' block
87. Redstone
88. Automated Chicken cookers using slabs will now function properly
89. Fixed Redstone not powering horizontally adjacent blocks
90. Hoppers and Droppers can now only put Music Discs inside Jukeboxes
91. Minecart with Hopper and TNT will no longer shake on Activator Rails
92. Renamed Shulker Boxes no longer lose their names when fired from a dispenser
93. Daylight Sensors can no longer generate power in the Nether
94. Undyed Shulker Boxes can no longer be placed inside other Shulker Boxes using Hoppers and Droppers
95. Mobs in Minecarts no longer activate rails next to them as they try to walk
96. Observers no longer visually cut Redstone Dust
97. Rails will now take block power into account when attaching to other rails
98. Dispensers, Droppers, and Redstone Lamps will now activate properly when Redstone Dust is placed on top of them
99. Trapped Chests with slabs or stairs above no longer power Redstone Dust adjacent to the block below when the chest is open
100. Glazed Terracotta can no longer be pulled using Slime Blocks and Sticky Pistons
101. Minecarts no longer get stuck when passing through blocks on diagonal rails
102. Armor can now be equipped to an Armor Stand using a Dispenser
103. The power output of Redstone Comparators is no longer lost after a world is converted from Xbox One Edition
104. Mobs
105. Baby Chickens no longer get stuck in the corners of fences
106. Increased the spawn rate of Slimes
107. Fixed mobs shaking while riding in Minecarts
108. Horses can no longer be steered in deep water
109. Llamas now form a caravan when following Llamas on a Lead instead of acting silly and running around in circles
110. Llamas can now be healed by feeding them Hay Bales and Wheat
111. Mobs no longer view closed doors as valid paths and shouldn't get stuck when trying to walk through them
112. Mobs can no longer spawn on carpet
113. Mobs will once again spawn when the player is below a height of 30 blocks
114. Mobs will once again not spawn on transparent blocks like Glass and Fences
115. Rabbits will now follow players that are holding carrots and flowers in Survival mode
116. Elder Guardian and Zombie Villager spawn eggs can now be obtained with Pick Block in Creative mode
117. Smaller mobs can no longer trample farmland and crops
118. Fixed medium Slimes not dealing damage to players
119. Endermites will no longer suffocate when riding in Minecarts and Boats that are not on rails or in the water
120. Fixed Villager behavior when it's raining so they now disperse to separate houses
121. The Wither will now face the right direction when attacking
122. Pigs being steered using Carrot on a Stick will no longer jump up slab staircases and simply walk up them
123. Fixed flowers that disappeared after being generated with Bone Meal
124. Mob spawners will now stop spawning when there are 6 or more mobs in the vicinity
125. Zombies and Skeletons now burn during daytime in warm biomes when it's raining in other biomes
126. Fixed Witches not spawning inside Witch Huts
127. Wolves will no longer run from Llamas if they are out of sight
128. Increased the spawn rate of Ghasts in the Nether
129. Increased the spawn rate of Ocelots
130. Spiders no longer give up so easily when attacking
131. Parrots will now properly dismount when the player it's riding dies
132. Parrots riding on players' shoulders will no longer hinder block placement while sneaking
133. Parrots will no longer leave player shoulders when boarding a Boat
134. Villagers will now breed on converted Xbox One worlds
135. Overworld mobs will no longer spawn in the Nether on converted Xbox One worlds
136. Iron Golems will no longer turn hostile toward the player that spawned them
137. Iron Golems no longer spawn when Mob Spawning is disabled
138. Crafting
139. Enchanted Apples can no longer be crafted (Golden Apples are still craftable)
140. Various improvements to selecting items on the Recipe Book with touch screens when using Classic UI
141. Crafting items that used ingredients in the hotbar no longer causes the hotbar to get shuffled when using a controller
142. Mossy Stone Bricks can no longer be crafted from themselves and no longer results in loss of blocks
143. Fixed Mojang logo banners not being craftable on converted Xbox One worlds
144. Bucket, Water Bucket, Lava Bucket, and Milk have been moved to the 'Items' inventory tab
145. Exploits
146. Players can no longer attack others with bows when Friendly Fire is disabled
147. Minecart with Hopper can no longer duplicate items
148. Items can no longer be duplicated using Item Frames and Hoppers
149. Any item held by a player that is killed by Thorns armor will no longer be duplicated
150. Rails can no longer be duplicated when pulled by two pistons simultaneously
151. Breaking a Cauldron, Furnace, Banner, Beacon, Jukebox, or Daylight Sensor with Silk Touch no longer drops two of each item
152. Breaking an Ender Chest with Silk Touch will no longer drop Obsidian
153. Items can no longer be duplicated using Item Frames and Hoppers
154. Switching between bows while aiming will no longer transfer item durability
155. Players can no longer attack through walls in third-person perspective
156. Killing an animal attached to a Fence with a Lead no longer duplicates the Lead
157. Realms
158. Permissions are no longer reset to default when a player re-enters a Realm
159. Operator status will now properly reflect in the in-game Player Permissions screen
160. Fixed a soft lock that occurred when attempting to replace a world and the connection was lost
161. Fixed an issue that sometimes prevented Realms from being renewed
162. Graphical
163. The line is now properly connected to the Fishing Rod and floater
164. Rain is now visible through glass
165. Sugar Cane now has proper biome coloring
166. Beacons will now shine through lava
167. Maps are no longer cut off when being held on vertical split-screen
168. Jungle Leaves now have transparency when held in-hand
169. Slimes now emit slime particles when jumping
170. Fixed a missing piece of the Hopper texture
171. Flickering no longer occurs when looking through leaves that are next to snow
172. Split-screen players will no longer share parts of the sky box backgrounds when they are in separate dimensions
173. Block breaking animation no longer goes out of sync when jumping or changing tools
174. Fixed the jumping animation for Spiders
175. Fixed shadow issues with Chorus Flowers when Smooth Lighting is disabled
176. Fire, Cobwebs, and Leaves can no longer be seen through blocks at certain distances
177. Jumping on a Horse, Donkey, or Mule while pushing against a wall with items attached to it no longer causes black blocks to appear around the wall
178. Fixed the Wither textures during spawning and death animations
179. Fixed the Axe not being attached to Vindicator's hand when attacking
180. Pistons and beds no longer have large visual outlines for a split second when being placed
181. Fixed being able to see through lava when Blindness effect is used
182. End Crystal beam is now centered at the Crystal and not at the fire base
183. End Crystal items now have the enchantment effect
184. Zombie Villagers now produce red particles while being cured
185. The Dragon Head will no longer flicker when using Norse Mythology textures
186. Resource Packs will now affect the look of the gamepad cursor
187. The moon will no longer graphically stutter when Do Daylight Cycle is disabled
188. TNT ignited by Redstone now shows the hopping animation
189. Items held by Zombie Villagers are now in the right position
190. Undyed Shulker Boxes no longer flash when being placed
191. Particles left after Dragon’s Breath attack and Lingering potions no longer leave visual artifacts
192. Smooth lighting will now be changed immediately after toggling in Settings
193. Fixed floating items that appeared after a player died and remained until they respawned when Keep Inventory was enabled
194. Chests are now placed in Item Frames with the proper rotation
195. Rain, smoke particles, and shadows are no longer visible through lava
196. Fixed a rare issue where rain and snow would fall through roofs
197. Audio
198. Fixed the sound effect not playing when equipping armor from the hotbar
199. Fixed missing sound when moving through End Gateways
200. The proper sound effects will now play when using Ender Chests, Brewing Stands, Armor Stands, Furnaces
201. Thrown entities no longer play footstep sounds
202. Sound will no longer continue to play on the disconnect screen
203. Minecarts will no longer make walking sounds after being pushed off and back on to rails
204. User Interface
205. Text can now be properly copied and pasted in text fields when using a keyboard
206. Fixed signs with formatting (§) not being able to create new lines
207. Fixed a rare issue when pressing the A key on the virtual keyboard would delete all other text
208. Reassigning the 'Toggle Perspective' key no longer changes perspective while typing in chat
209. Fixed world names not being editable if they contained over 24 characters
210. Non-functional split-screen options are no longer visible in Settings for VR and mobile devices
211. The oxygen bar is no longer misplaced when getting out of a boat and diving underwater
212. Several improvements to navigating menus while using a controller
213. After cancelling the ""Checking Download"" prompt, players are now taken back to the World Settings screen
214. World save size is now properly reported immediately after saving and exiting
215. The number of worlds on the Worlds tab is no longer overlapped by the world icon
216. Fixed an issue that caused players to get stuck after posting a screenshot to a Club
217. Changing Screen Safe Area size and GUI scale will now set the proper positions for the hotbar, health, hunger, and paper doll
218. Deleting a world with a colored name no longer has extra colored text in the confirmation prompt
219. The player model no longer appears in from the 'Choose New Skin' button
220. Fixed an unhelpful error message when attempting to create a Realm and the ""You can create and join clubs"" permission is blocked
221. Pressing the screen is no longer offset slightly to the left on Windows 10 Mobile
222. Disabling Controller Hints will now turn off hints on in-game menus
223. Fixed the Creative hotbar not always clearing when X is pressed on the controller
224. When editing a page in Book & Quill, pressing B on the controller will now quit page edit mode instead of the whole book screen
225. Items can once again be dropped by moving them into the grey space of the Creative inventory screen
226. Fixed the gamepad cursor snapping incorrectly when highlighting the off-hand slot and clicking the Left Thumbstick
227. Fixed not being able to snap the gamepad cursor between the Furnace fuel slot and output slot
228. Expandable inventory groups in Pocket UI are now titled properly
229. Shift-clicking items into a Donkey's full chest will no longer cause the items to disappear
230. Fixed incorrect items appearing in Creative inventory searches
231. Shulker Box inventory tooltips are now properly translated to other languages
232. A loading screen will now appear when applying Global Resources
233. Fixed chat messages not appearing after signing in to Xbox Live in-game from the Achievements screen
234. The Jukebox now has a controller tooltip for block use
235. Fixed a delay in the 'Boost' button appearing when mounting a Pig with Carrot on a Stick in hand
236. Fixed lowered frame rate when unfocusing from the Book & Quill
237. HUD opacity now affects Banners mob heads in the hotbar
238. Fixed delays when typing in chat and other text fields
239. Fixed screen ratio and portions of the HUD being blocked when playing on iPhone X
240. Sea Lanterns now appear in the proper category when searching the inventory
241. Fixed double notifications appearing when importing a world
242. A warning now appears instructing players not to close the game when exporting a world
243. Fixed some worlds not appearing on the Available Templates list when not downloaded
244. Navigating left or right on the Available Templates list will no longer move focus to the top of the list
245. Several translation fixes for Español (Mexico)
246. Store descriptions can now be scrolled on mobile devices
247. Commands
248. Cloned Banners no longer appear as blank black Banners
249. The ""Facing"" component of '/teleport' is no longer executed before teleporting a player
250. Redstone Dust can no longer be placed in air, or blocks not suited for it, using commands
251. Players can now be killed using '/kill' when they have a resistance effect of 4 or higher
252. Fixed repeating damage sound and animation when using '/effect' to get health and simultaneously taking damage
253. The screen will no longer shake when standing on Magma blocks after applying Regeneration effect of 255 or more
254. Banners placed with '/fill' command are no longer random colors on Realms
255. Teleporting entities to or from a ticking area no longer fail to render or be interacted with
256. Players will no longer receive an Unknown Map when using ‘/replaceitem’ command to place a map in the off-hand slot
257. Items will now be received immediately and correctly when using '/give' command with a Chain Command Block
258. Fixed 'End_gateway' and 'End_portal' having placeholder images when auto-completing commands
259. Teleporting a horse while it's being ridden now works as intended
260. Buttons cloned in a ""pressed"" state no longer remain pressed forever
261. Repeatedly teleporting TNT vertically will no longer separate the visual block from its explosive location
262. Ocelots no longer spawn in groups when spawned using commands
263. Armor models now support hat layers
264. Boats can now have more than one seat
265. 'llamaspit.json' has been properly renamed to 'llama_spit.json'
266. Removed 'slot.armor.chest' from Horses and Llamas
267. 'behavior.hurt_by_target' no longer triggers if an entity is not actually hurt by its target
268. All parameters of 'minecraft:breathable' now function properly
269. Name Tags can now be always visible if they are set to do so through a Behavior Pack

**Update:** https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360004167331-Minecraft-1-2-13-Bedrock

1.2.11.title: Minecraft - 1.2.11 (Bedrock)
1.2.11.md:
__**Minecraft - 1.2.11 (Bedrock)**__
> Highlights from this update:

**Fixes:**
1. Moving full stacks between containers is once again possible on Pocket UI
2. Increased the speed of crop growth and grass spreading
3. Vines that don't have a support block will no longer float in mid-air
4. Pistons no longer get into a state where they pause, activate randomly, and potentially crash the game
5. The 'Beam Me Up' achievement can once again be unlocked
6. Friendly Fire (PvP) can now be toggled from World Options
7. Adjusted vertical look acceleration when using a controller
8. Crashes/Performance
9. Fixed a crash that occurred when firing projectiles
10. General
11. The 'Beam Me Up' achievement can once again be unlocked
12. Starting Map and Bonus Chest can no longer be toggled for template worlds
13. Gameplay
14. Increased the speed of crop growth and grass spreading
15. Players no longer float above beds while sleeping
16. Vines that don't have a support block will no longer float in mid-air
17. Players can no longer jump out of minecarts using the default jump button if it has been bound to a different button
18. Minecarts no longer collide with adjacent minecarts on separate tracks
19. The map owner's icon is now sorted to the top of the map
20. When elevated, directional blocks now always face upwards, regardless of the player's coordinates
21. Maps can now be held simultaneously in the main hand and offhand
22. Redstone
23. Pistons no longer get into a state where they pause, activate randomly, and potentially crash the game
24. Sticky Pistons and Slime Blocks can no longer pull and break Comparators
25. Shulker Boxes will no longer be dispensed as items if the dispenser is obstructed
26. Burned out Redstone torches will no longer reactivate until they receive a block update or are replaced
27. Mobs
28. Reduced the explosion range of Creepers
29. Endermen that are aggravated will now take fall damage as they should, no longer breaking Ender Pearl farms
30. Crafting
31. Fixed an incorrect amount of wool blocks that can be dyed in the Recipe Book
32. User Interface
33. Moving full stacks between containers is once again possible on Pocket UI
34. Made it easier to invite friends to games by pressing X on the invite screen
35. Creative menu tabs can now be scrolled using the Right Thumbstick when the 'Hide Gamepad Cursor' option is enabled
36. Selecting ""Sync Worlds"" no longer causes the selected button to dramatically shift up (Xbox One)
37. Removed unnecessary text from map tooltips in the inventory
38. Commands
39. Pressing the Menu button on the Xbox One controller will now execute quick commands

**Update:** https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360004167871-Minecraft-1-2-11-Bedrock

1.2.10.title: Minecraft - 1.2.10 (Bedrock)
1.2.10.md:
__**Minecraft - 1.2.10 (Bedrock)**__
> Changes:

**Fixes:**
1. Gamepad cursor sensitivity can now be adjusted in Controller settings
2. Increased tick radius range, which can be adjusted when creating or editing a world
3. Enabling the Mute toggle will no longer suppress non-chat messages like players leaving and joining
4. Cartographer Villagers will now give maps for new Ocean Monuments and Woodland Mansions that are not in known generated chunks
5. Fixed the hunger bar not filling up in converted Xbox One worlds
6. Opening the chat screen with ""/"" no longer places the cursor before the slash
7. Changed the error message that appeared when attempting to purchase content and not having enough Minecoins
8. Players can no longer accidentally purchase marketplace content from the patch notes screen by repeatedly mashing the A button

**Update:** https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360004127032-Minecraft-1-2-10-Bedrock

1.2.9.title: Minecraft - 1.2.9 (Bedrock)
1.2.9.md:
__**Minecraft - 1.2.9 (Bedrock)**__
> Tweaks:

**Fixes:**
1. Coordinates, Fire Spreads, TNT Explodes, Mob Loot, Tile Drops, and Natural Regeneration can now be toggled from the world edit screen without enabling cheats
2. Increased the spawn rate of animals to make them easier to find
3. Crashes/Performance
4. Fixed a crash that occurred when signing into Xbox Live on Android devices
5. Fixed a crash that occurred when moving items in Beacons and Enchanting Tables when using Pocket UI
6. Fixed a crash that occurred when loading chunks
7. Fixed a crash that occurred when rendering moon phases and game time was negative
8. Fixed a crash that occurred when editing a world or Realm name that was more than six characters in length
9. General
10. Fixed a rare issue that caused items, experience, and player positions to change after rejoining a world
11. Gameplay
12. Creepers will now stop walking when they are about to explode
13. Creepers will no longer explode after losing their line of sight of players
14. Blocks can once again be continually placed while sneaking
15. Wither Skeletons will once again spawn in Nether fortresses
16. Animals are now attracted to food if the player is outside of a fenced area or standing inside a Fence block
17. Animals can once again be lured over uneven terrain without losing interest
18. Text entry no longer continues on the first line of a sign even after creating a new line
19. Fixed signs with formatting (§) not being able have new lines of text

21. Safe Screen Area now has independent horizontal and vertical options and can be set separately on each platform
22. Pocket UI now respects Screen Safe Area and fixed the iPhone X default Screen Safe Area
23. Graphical artifacts no longer appear in split-screen when riding a pig
24. Fixed the labels of 'Back' buttons on menu screens
25. Book & Quill text is now readable with the Natural texture pack

1.2.6.title: Minecraft - 1.2.6 (Bedrock)
1.2.6.md:
__**Minecraft - 1.2.6 (Bedrock)**__
> New Features:

**Fixes:**
1. Minecraft Realms have Xbox Live Clubs integrated! Now you can share pictures and posts with the members of your Realm, not only within but also outside the game. You can also get to your new club with the Xbox app on your phone, PC, or console
2. Adventure Maps
3. Alteria by Razzleberries
4. Jurassic Depths by Everbloom Studios
5. Worlds
6. Winter Mini-Games Festival by Noxcrew
7. Dropper of Horrors by Noxcrew
8. Winter Fest by Blockception
9. Ugah Ugah by Pathway Studios
10. Kingdom Assault by Blockception
11. Skin Packs
12. The Kingdom by Pixel²
13. Holly Jolly by Eneija
14. Festive Birdies! by 57Digital
15. Winter Festival Skin Pack by Noxcrew
16. K-Pop: Pink Star by Pathway Studios
17. An updated look for Horses, Mules, and Donkeys
18. Changed the color of the menu button hover state to improve accessibility
19. Crashes/Performance
20. Fixed a crash that occurred when exiting a world with a ticking area
21. Fixed a crash that occurred when world chunks were discarded
22. Fixed a crash that occurred when resuming the application (Windows 10)
23. Fixed a crash that occurred when changing users (Xbox One)
24. Fixed a crash that occurred when navigating the Minecraft Store
25. General
26. Free Marketplace content no longer requires signing in to Xbox Live to download
27. Fixed an exploit that allowed players to unlock achievements when cheats were enabled
28. Skins will now change when purchased and equipped in the in-game Skin Picker
29. Fixed Villagers not picking up food or breed in converted worlds (Xbox One)
30. All End Gateway portals will now convert properly from old worlds (Xbox One)
31. Spider Jockeys no longer disappear after world conversion (Xbox One)
32. Consumable items can now be repurchased on servers
33. Gameplay
34. Fixed block placement not being as easy as it should be when holding down place block
35. Increased the joystick deadzone on Windows Mixed Reality controllers
36. Players will no longer suffocate inside blocks after getting out of bed
37. Boats will now be descend smoothly on ice blocks
38. Extra layers of snow will no longer appear in snowy biomes after reloading a world
39. Tools no longer disappear when dispensed to a player's empty inventory slot
40. Redstone
41. Fixed Redstone not powering horizontally adjacent blocks
42. Mobs
43. Animals can once again jump over blocks while being lured with food
44. Decreased the spawn rate of Zombie Pigmen from Nether portals
45. Crafting
46. Pistons will now stack in the inventory and will not be lost after crafting
47. Graphical / Audio
48. Black lines no longer appear on the edges of blocks when riding in a minecart
49. Minecarts will no longer make footstep sounds
50. Sound effects will no longer play when disconnected from a world
51. Food particles now appear when feeding all types of animals
52. Fixed graphic corruption on the paper doll (Windows Mixed Reality)
53. User Interface
54. Items no longer disappear when painted in the crafting inventory with touch controls
55. The inventory cursor no longer gains a durability bar after dropping damaged items
56. The Screen Size prompt slider is now active by default when loading the game for the first time
57. Store items will no longer appear twice in the same category
58. Menus are now properly aligned, regardless of Screen Safe Area value
59. Fixed text when disembarking a boat with touch controls
60. Commands
61. Using 'detect' with '/execute' is now much more reliable
62. Teleporting a non-host player no longer causes entities riding that player to dismount
63. Teleporting entities to or from a ticking area will no longer fail to render or be non-interactive

**Update:** https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360004168311-Minecraft-1-2-6-Bedrock

1.2.5.title: Minecraft - 1.2.5 (Bedrock)
1.2.5.md:
__**Minecraft - 1.2.5 (Bedrock)**__
> New Features:

**Fixes:**
1. Added a new Recipe Book toggle with the ability to view the Creative inventory in fullscreen
2. Windows Mixed Reality support
3. Mixer Interactivity: Game commands can now be linked to interactive buttons for viewers to interact directly with the game. Learn more at aka.ms/mixer-in-minecraft
4. Mobile Broadcasting: Native broadcasting for several streaming services has been added. Look for the new Broadcast button directly in-game
5. Added a content rating system to the Marketplace
6. Adventure Maps
7. My Gorilla Adventure by Toya
8. Infinity Plumber by Jigarbov Productions
9. Worlds
10. Sandspear Castle by Blockception
11. Birch Island by Norvale
12. Shipwreck Shantytown by Everbloom Studios
13. Skin Packs
14. Frontiers by Irish
15. Birdies! by 57Digital
16. Woof! by 57Digital
17. Meow! by 57Digital
18. Star Knights by Pathway Studios
19. Space Dinos by Pathway Studios
20. Plumber Pack by Jigarbov Productions
21. Happy Thanksgiving by PixelHeads
22. Improvements to the Create screen for available templates
23. The Server tab now displays a loading bar when fetching server ping and player count
24. The main menu background now has a raised camera angle and scales properly based on the device's aspect ratio
25. Crashes/Performance
26. Fixed a crash that occurred when dispensing an undyed Shulker Box
27. Fixed a crash that occurred when destroying banners
28. Fixed a crash that occurred when using the '/fill' command with several different blocks
29. Fixed a crash that occurred when loading a Realm that contains banners
30. Fixed a crash that occurred when leaving a world (iOS only)
31. Fixed a crash that occurred when entering a world while wearing armor
32. Fixed a crash that occurred when sending a message containing ""%0""
33. Fixed a crash that occurred when attempting to teleport millions of blocks away
34. Fixed a crash that occurred when mobs were killed by something that wasn't an entity
35. Increased performance when jumping into water when mobs are nearby
36. General
37. Fixed an issue where some owners of Minecraft on Android devices would be prompted to acquire a license
38. Fixed being unable to create or launch worlds after signing out of Xbox Live with an encrypted pack applied (Windows 10 only)
39. Removed the hard-coded chat filter from featured servers
40. Coordinates are no longer censored
41. Xbox Live accounts with Communication & Multiplayer settings set to ""Blocked"" are no longer able to join Realms by using invite links/codes
42. Fixed an exploit surrounding the use of encrypted skin packs
43. Editing 'options.txt' can once again be used to increase chunk render distance
44. The 'minecraft:transformation' component now has a 'keep_owner' property to allow for an entity to keep its original owner
45. Xbox One World Conversion and Cloud Saves
46. Fixed several issues with missing chunks and lost progress during world conversion
47. Worlds deleted or changed on other consoles will now sync with the console they were created on
48. Fixed changes made in converted worlds not saving after a player walks into another dimension
49. Template world data is no longer lost when loading a cloud save on a different console
50. Gameplay
51. Armor Stands ride in minecarts again
52. Armor stands will now wobble when hit by players
53. Fixed issue of standing signs not breaking when their support is destroyed
54. Players without block breaking permissions can no longer break crops by jumping
55. The arrow marker on a map no longer becomes a dot when a player walks out of the map bounds
56. Tools will no longer lose durability faster than mobs take damage
57. Fall height is no longer compounded the next time a player takes fall damage when chorus fruit teleports a player from a higher elevation
58. Players can no longer take damage when walking backwards and placing blocks at head level
59. Flying is no longer activated when trying to sprint in water with Auto Jump enabled in Creative mode
60. Players will no longer spawn at a the position of a destroyed bed when leaving the End
61. Natural Regeneration can now be disabled on Peaceful difficulty
62. Decreased explosion resistance of slabs
63. Lily pads can now be broken by boats when colliding from any direction
64. Banners in item frames no longer change patterns based on the banner that the player in holding
65. Fixed hopper minecarts not filling from chests when slightly clipped into a block
66. Redstone
67. Redstone Repeaters facing into Redstone Dust now properly redirect the Dust
68. Observers facing each other now output a steady, repeating Redstone signal
69. Observers now properly redirect Redstone Dust
70. Observers powering Redstone Dust below will now power components adjacent to the dust
71. Pistons no longer get stuck or break randomly
72. Fixed the timing of pistons interacting with other pistons
73. Daylight sensors no longer output power at night when they have no view of the sky
74. Mobs
75. Hostile mobs will no longer spawn on top or inside transparent blocks
76. Zombie Pigmen no longer disappear immediately after spawning in Nether portals
77. Endermen will only become hostile when looking at their heads
78. Skeletons now turn before shooting
79. Creepers standing in double tallgrass now deal appropriate damage
80. Parrots no longer choose the same mob to follow repeatedly
81. Parrots will now react to being on fire in Survival mode but will no longer burn when perched on a player's shoulder in Creative mode
82. Tamed horses, donkeys, and mules can now be ridden immediately if mounted while eating grass
83. Fixed parrots losing their sitting status when loading a world and, incidentally, fixed chickens flapping their wings after spawn
84. The Ender Dragon can no longer get stuck in boats
85. Sheep that spawned from breeding will now drop loot
86. Slightly increased the spawn rate of Ocelots
87. Crafting
88. Repeaters and Comparators can now only be crafted using normal stone
89. Bed recipe will now appear in the Recipe Book when only one ingredient is present in the inventory
90. Starting maps will now upgrade correctly on an anvil
91. After running out of materials for torches, books, or bookshelves, cursor focus no longer moves to another item
92. Graphical / Audio
93. The camera no longer flickers along the Y-axis after teleporting
94. Hitting mobs will now produce an impact/damage sound
95. Fixed the sound when throwing items
96. Non-full blocks no longer appear as the full width of a block when moved by pistons
97. Blocks moved by pistons no longer leave stretched graphical artifacts
98. Fixed items in item frames not being lit correctly when viewed at certain angles
99. Fixed banner items being too bright
100. Fixed misplaced particles when breaking doors and gates
101. Fixed chests, pumpkins, and stairs not facing the right direction in hand
102. Entities and particles are now properly lit in the Nether when playing in split-screen (Xbox One only)
103. Fixed a corrupted audio loop when pointing at an item frame in Adventure mode
104. User Interface
105. Signs will now close when the virtual keyboard is closed
106. Fixed the XP Cost text on the anvil screen not being readable
107. Resource Packs downloaded from the store will no longer appear in the Behavior Packs section of the Storage screen
108. Content is now fully removed from Storage if deleted after restarting the game
109. The ""Import started"" notification will no longer be delayed to appear when importing large content packs
110. Improved navigation when using a controller on several menu screens
111. Items on the cursor will now be dropped when the inventory is full and the inventory screen is closed
112. Improved navigation of the inventory screen when using the controller cursor
113. Settings sliders can no longer be adjusted with the D-pad until the A button is used to select them
114. Controller hints will now say ""Place"" while sneaking and aiming at a container
115. Fixed placeholder images for items on the Storage screen
116. Fixed the rendering of borders on the Skin Picker screen
117. Scroll bars are now visible after switching tabs on the Settings screen
118. Default Settings option in Controller Settings now properly resets Hide Controller Hints and Hide Gamepad Cursor options
119. Several fixes to Marketplace menus
120. Commands
121. Having the PvP game rule disabled no longer makes players immune to the '/kill' command
122. The '/clear' command will now clear items from armor slots by item name
123. Flowers and beds are now properly cloned by the '/clone' command
124. Using the '/give' command when the inventory is full will drop items in front of the player
125. Arrow of Decay can now be given using the '/give' command
126. Mobs can now be rotated using the 'xRot' and 'yRot' arguments when using teleport commands
127. Names of players outside of render distance will now appear in auto-complete when typing commands
128. Fixed an incorrect error message when the '/replaceitem' command has an out of range value

**Update:** https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360004168331-Minecraft-1-2-5-Bedrock

1.2.3.title: Minecraft - 1.2.3 (Bedrock)
1.2.3.md:
__**Minecraft - 1.2.3 (Bedrock)**__
> New Features:

**Fixes:**
1. Added a button to join a Realm using an invite code on the Friends tab, for platforms that can't click on Realms invite links
2. Adventure Maps
3. Block & Seek by Polymaps
4. Dr. Splice’s Lab Escape by 57Digital
5. Mystery Lands: Scary Chunks by Pathway Studios
6. The Cube Theater by Qwertyuiopthepie
7. The Haunted Neighborhood by PixelHeads
8. Worlds
9. Fall Fest by Blockception
10. FightMe! By Pathway Studios
11. Land's End by Blockworks
12. SkyFair by Blockworks
13. Skin Packs
14. Boo! by 57Digital
15. Cute But Spoopy by Eneija
16. Onsie by Eneija
17. The Boo Crew by Razzleberries
18. Lucha Libre by 57Digital
19. Spookfest by Irish
20. Sci-Fi Horror by Pathway Studios
21. Space Crew by InPvP
22. Spooky Skeleton by Blockception
23. Pressing the A button on the Creative inventory will now place one item in the inventory, not a full stack. Pressing the Y button will place a full stack and X will clear the hotbar in Creative mode
24. iOS render distance is no longer limited to 6 chunks on higher memory devices
25. Fixed an exploit that allowed child accounts to join servers when multiplayer permissions were disabled
26. Fixed a crash when the game was suspended (Xbox One only)
27. Fixed a crash that occurred if a player with blocked multiplayer privileges was in a world and accepted an invite from another player (Xbox One only)
28. Fixed a crash that occurred when closing the skin picker
29. Fixed a crash that occurred when loading world chunks
30. Fixed a crash that occurred when using the crafting screen
31. Fixed a crash that occurred when going through a Nether portal and then using a piston
32. Fixed a crash that occurred when crafting items while a split-screen player joined (Xbox One only)
33. Fixed a crash when pressing OK on the disconnect message after suspending and resuming the game (iOS only)
34. Fixed a crash that occurred with Iron Golems on converted worlds
35. Fixed a crash that occurred when using the '/fill' command that caused to many spawned entities to fall
36. Fixed a crash that occurred when using uppercase letters in '/gamerule' commands
37. Fixed a crash on low memory iOS devices
38. The game will no longer freeze if a second player joins with split-screen while the first player controller is disconnected (Xbox One only)
39. Decreased the sensitivity of placing blocks
40. The 'Sniper Duel' achievement is now unlockable (Xbox One only)
41. The 'Inception' achievement in now unlockable on all platforms
42. Fixed an exploit that caused rails to be duplicated
43. Fixed an exploit that caused Shulker boxes to be duplicated when broken by an explosion
44. The Sign screen can now be closed if the cursor has been moved to the third line (iOS only)
45. Fixed worlds that were created on Xbox One not opening after being downloaded to another platform from Realms
46. Fire Resistance effect will now properly protect players after quitting and rejoining a world
47. The virtual keyboard no longer opens and can't be closed when opening Host Options (Fire TV only)
48. Fixed torches and other light sources giving off very little light when Smooth Lighting was enabled
49. Attacking or mining with an enchanted book will no longer apply the book's enchantment
50. Players can no longer be targeted by mobs before loading into a world or dimension
51. Fixed an issue causing transparency issues on several skins
52. Pressing the A button no longer cancels Elytra flight and will now make the player ascend
53. Players will no longer cease climbing stairs and slabs while flying
54. Fixed Iron Golems not causing enough Knockback effect
55. Servers will no longer briefly appear on the Friends tab
56. Heavy blocks no longer break when falling on leaf blocks
57. Fixed the texture offset of Mooshroom's udder layer
58. Cobweb will now drop as an item when cut with shears
59. Sheep no longer emit two sounds when dying
60. Food particles now appear when feeding animals
61. Items renamed in an anvil that have been placed will now retain their names after being mined
62. Several improvements to handling split-screen controller assignments (Xbox One only)
63. The game will no longer accept input from the previous controller after changing controllers while the game is suspended (Xbox One only)
64. Split-screen players are now correctly assigned after their controllers are disconnected and reconnect in a different order (Xbox One only)
65. Fixed Guardians not spawning in Ocean Monuments
66. Leaves that have snow over them will no longer appear black
67. Fixed an issue that could cause chat to freeze if there was a high amount of chat output
68. Skulls can now be placed on the ground when a layer of snow is already there
69. Endermen now take damage in filled cauldrons
70. Doors, Wooden Buttons, Ladders and Fishing Rods can now be used as fuel in a Furnace
71. Fixed some vines being destroyed when pressing right-click
72. Fixed an incorrect controller tooltip when moving an item in the Creative inventory over the hotbar
73. All mobs can now be spawned on water by players
74. It's now easier to see the texture animation of flowing water
75. Spider and Endermen eyes are now slightly visible when hit with invisibility potions
76. Fixed no sound when filling a bottle with Dragon's Breath
77. ""Elytra Wings"" are now referred to simply as ""Elytra""
78. Players with Fire Resistance will now receive damage from lightning
79. Fixed a constant green highlight on the inventory screen of tamable mobs
80. Pumpkins and mob heads can now be equipped directly from the Creative inventory on Pocket UI
81. When placing layered snow, only one block will now be taken from the inventory
82. Flint and Steel no longer takes damage when hitting mobs
83. Using Pick Block on giant mushrooms will no longer give unobtainable mushroom blocks
84. Arrows that are picked up will now join an existing stack in the offhand slot, not creating a separate stack
85. Minecarts and boats can no longer be destroyed by Ender Pearls
86. Door and fence gates can now be placed on dirt path blocks
87. Items moving in flowing water will no longer have jittery movement
88. Dead bushes can now be replaced when placing blocks and items
89. Decreased the hitbox size on crops
90. The hitbox size of Nether Wart will now increase as it grows
91. Increased the distance that the Enchantment Table book will open when a player approaches it
92. Runes no longer float from bookshelves to the Enchantment Table at the same time
93. Fixed graphical issues with the experience bar when the Candy Texture Pack is applied
94. Banners will now wave when daylight cycle is disabled
95. Light Gray Shulker Boxes now have the proper name
96. Shulker Boxes now only give a full Redstone signal when filled with 27 full item stacks
97. Top snow is now destroyed immediately after placing water or lava over it
98. Food particles no longer come out of players' foreheads
99. Crafting and container screens now close when a player takes from another player or mob
100. It is no longer possible for players to place a block in the same space they are sneaking, causing them to fall
101. Uncraftable and unobtainable items no longer appear in the Recipe Book in Survival mode
102. The tooltip for Stone variants in the Recipe Book now properly show they're in the ""Nature"" category
103. Split-screen GUI Scale is now saved separately from Fullscreen GUI Scale (Xbox One only)
104. Mooshroom now displays a particle effect when sheared
105. Eating and drinking animations are now visible when a player is seen from third-person view while under the invisibility status effect
106. Additional Map items are no longer lost when more than one Map is placed in an Anvil’s input slot while creating a Locator Map
107. Fixed player's camera Y-value from flickering up/down when the player teleports
108. Fixed ""Custom"" skin name appearing as placeholder text on player skin change notifications
109. Fixed the left leg being rotated the wrong way on armor stand poses
110. Items replaced by a command are now visible instantly in the inventory
111. The ""Choose Skin"" text no longer flickers on the Skin Picker (Android only)
112. Scroll bars in menus no longer jitter when using the right stick to scroll
113. Fixed low-speed movement occurring after controller thumbstick is released (VR only)
114. When pressing tab to complete a command, the choices are now sorted correctly
115. Adding a 'damage_sensor' to an entity type no longer prevents '/kill' from working

1.2.1.title: Minecraft - 1.2.1 (Bedrock)
1.2.1.md:
__**Minecraft - 1.2.1 (Bedrock)**__
> New Features:

**Fixes:**
1. Added a free cursor to the inventory screen when navigating with a controller
2. Added a video setting to toggle gameplay field of view changes
3. When selecting an item from the Creative inventory when the hotbar is full and using a controller, the item will be placed on the cursor and focus will shift to the hotbar, offering them the opportunity to replace an existing item in the hotbar with the new item
4. Adjusted block placement speed when using a controller
5. Added a white outline to highlighted inventory slots and recipes
6. Made several fixes to make navigating Settings, Create New World, Edit World, and How to Play screens more intuitive when using a controller
7. Increased performance on third-party servers
8. Fixed a crash that occurred due to rendering issues
9. Fixed a crash that occurred when changing to a user profile that had no save data
10. Fixed a crash that occurred when ""Saving World"" message appeared and a player signed out of their profile while in a world
11. Descriptions will now save if it is the last field interacted with before exporting to Remix 3D (Windows 10 only)
12. Fixed the Recipe Book ""Search"" text marker becoming blocked in certain circumstances
13. ""@r"" will no longer target the oldest entity and will now target a random entity
14. Fixed the particles and animation when using the '/summon' command to spawn a firework rocket
15. Minecart with Command Block now has collision with other blocks after going off rails
16. Fixed a crash when going to the Settings screen after being disconnected from a server
17. The menu no longer needs to be scrolled to see Adventure mode in the game mode dropdown menu
18. Players can no longer take fall damage when jumping into an End Portal in Creative mode
19. Fixed the Creative inventory being empty after connecting to an external server
20. Jumping into a minecart while directly under a block will no longer place the player above the block
21. Fixed Settings sliders not appearing correctly
22. Fixed navigation of the Villager trading screen when using a controller so it's a much more intuitive experience
23. Slimes will once again spawn below layer 40, regardless of light level
24. Experience orbs are now easier to pick up
25. Fixed several issues with the MINECON 2015 Skin Pack
26. Templates on the Create screen are now sorted by owned items first
27. The GUI Scale slider will now adjust based on how many scales are available per device
28. Fixed the transparency of several skins
29. Music change is now synchronized when moving between dimensions
30. Crop blocks will no longer break if a block is placed above them
31. The player list in Host Options will now properly scroll (Xbox One only)
32. Fixed firework explosion sound range being too low
33. Mobs will no longer play sound effects twice when being spawned
34. The crosshair will no longer appear when in third-person camera modes
35. Fixed an issue with charged Creeper and Wither shields not appearing (Xbox One only)
36. Fixed a crash when gliding with Elytra wings in split-screen (Xbox One only)
37. Players can now use the A button to remove items when the Open Containers permission is set
38. Fixed the missing sound effect when combining two items on an anvil
39. The Host Options button is now visible on the chat screen while playing Realms with cheats enabled
40. Fixed the arrow texture of the Observer item being flipped 180 degrees
41. Fixed mobs not spawning in parts of the overworld
42. Fixed the jump animation of ignited TNT
43. Using '/execute tp' will now work with tildes and positive coordinates
44. Fixed a crash when trying to load a Realms member list with a large amount of members (iOS only)
45. Fixed the player permissions screen in the pause menu showing no options
46. Fixed the How to Play screen in the pause menu showing no text
47. When giving a player an item in the same tick as a '/clear' command, the item is no longer invisible until the player right-clicks on a block
48. Fixed a crash when using 'spawn_entity' in an Add-On 'min_wait_time' and 'max_wait_time' is the same
49. Using middle mouse button to collect blocks when the first hotbar slot is left empty no longer causes items to vanish from the hotbar
50. Chunks will now reappear without having to do move after resuming the game (Xbox One only)
51. Fixed a crash that occurred when suspending the game (Xbox One only)
